title: Bech is Back
description: Henry Bech, first heard from in Bech: A Book, is back. Famous for his writer's block, a Jew adrift in a world of gentiles, the renowned author is now fifty years old. Here he reflects on his fam, roams the world, marries an Episcopalian divorcee from Westchester and -- surprise to all -- writes a book that becomes a smash bestseller.
author: John Updike
